Paul May

Another Year Older

01 November 2005

Yes. 25. The quarter century. I don’t feel old at all. Seriously. No, I really don’t. Crikey, I’m only 25…it’s been an interesting few decades plus five years so far.

Work is going well, life is going well. I can’t believe it’s November already.

I hope you’re well wherever you are.
